.. _concepts:

Concepts
========

.. toctree::
   :name: conceptstoc
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: This project introduces a few concepts which are tightly
             integrated into how it works and is pre-requisite to using
             some of its more advanced features. These concepts can involve
             a number of things such as changing the semantics of how a
             user programs with Python, how comments are treated differently,
             and even how to represent types in IDA.

   multicase
   tagging
   matching
   combinators
   pythontyping
